title: Ferguson Braces For Grand Jury's Decision On Michael Brown Shooting
teaser: A grand jury is expected to announce soon whether Darren Wilson, the police officer who shot and killed Michael Brown, will be indicted. The city is on edge as police, government officials, residents and protesters prepare for the decision and its aftermath.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
